title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
OB: Clicking on "OK" and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that its title becomes "www.actuate.com".
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but currently it changes with settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Click on "OK" in the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Expected result: The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options".
